title: timeout
content: # `prefect.utilities.timeout` ## Functions ### `fail_if_not_timeout_error` ```python theme={null} fail_if_not_timeout_error(timeout_exc_type: type[Exception]) -> None ``` ### `timeout_async` ```python theme={null} timeout_async(seconds: Optional[float] = None, timeout_exc_type: type[TimeoutError] = TimeoutError) ``` ### `timeout` ```python theme={null} timeout(seconds: Optional[float] = None, timeout_exc_type: type[TimeoutError] = TimeoutError) ```
